articles.description: Flipkart and Amazon are offering discounts and bundled offers on top mobile phones during their Diwali 2020 special sales. We've handpicked some of the best deals on mobile phones available this week.
articles.content: Flipkart and Amazon are running their Diwali 2020 special sales this week. Flipkart's Big Diwali sale and Amazon's Great Indian Festival sale are offering discounts and bundled offers on smartphones … [+5601 chars]
